title: Term 2 holidays (not like anyone cares)
content:
term 2 ends for me tommorow which means i will be away from 16/6/06 - 28/6/06, alltough i haven't been on the board lately i will come back as i have said a thousand times, i have no plans to leave anytime soon

see you all after then
rorieRorie

title: Re: Term 2 holidays (not like anyone cares)
content:

title: Re: Term 2 holidays (not like anyone cares)
content:
But even if people DO post enough that you notice that they are gone people still might not care. For example... where is Najawa?

Ohright! ... No one cares.

But then again you take someone who isn't that much of a poster but people still like them, like for example... Z-1, and people will still care if they leave the forums.

What it really comes down to is the quality of the posts.-----------------------
